lead_paragraph: The former New York governor alleges that he is subject of an expanding extortion attempt by Svetlana Andreevna Zakharova.

headline.print_headline: Spitzer Sues Woman Who Accused Him of Assaulting Her at Hotel
headline.main: Eliot Spitzer Sues Woman Who Accused Him of Assault

snippet: The former New York governor alleges that he is subject of an expanding extortion attempt by Svetlana Andreevna Zakharova....
abstract: Former New York Gov Eliot Spitzer files lawsuit against Svetlana Andreevna Zakharova, also known as Lana Travis, who accused him of assaulting her at Plaza Hotel in Manhattan; alleges assault charge is part of extortion attempt and says Zakharova also wanted to rekindle relationship with him.
